pages.title: Tubman
pages.text: I hope you weren't expecting to return things to how they were with a simple swish of a wand. With so much lost, there are limits to what can be done without a bit of good ol' fashioned physical labour.
Surely you're wondering what is to be done with those berries by now, but for that you'll need to make a $(item)Wooden Tub$(), and a $(item)Terracotta Drying Basin$().
